tools.name: query_cost_explorer
tools.description: Summarize AWS spend patterns, flag anomalies, and surface optimization signals. Optional query params: days, groupBy, granularity, filterDimension, filterValue, forecast, anomalies, savings.

tools.name: get_cost_anomalies
tools.description: Find unusual billing spikes and summarize likely drivers. Optional query params: startDate, endDate, dimension.

tools.name: rightsizing_recommendations
tools.description: Pull Compute Optimizer guidance for EC2, RDS, Lambda, and EBS resources. Optional query params: resourceTypes, accountIds, limit.

tools.name: trigger_automation
tools.description: Run automated FinOps workflows such as rightsizing and cost actions. JSON body: {action, context, schedule?}.

tools.name: get_budget_alerts
tools.description: Fetch budget details and alert status. Optional query params: budgetName, accountId.

tools.name: optimize_reserved_instances
tools.description: Assess Reserved Instance usage and propose optimizations. JSON body: {analysisType, timeRange}.
